title: The Ant Who Saved Her Colony/The Boy Who Couldn't Stop Crying
description:
The Story Pirates discover there is a drain in the ocean floor, and they’re headed right for it! Featuring two new stories: “The Ant Who Saved Her Colony,” a song about an unlikely hero who saves her community using her special skills, written by Harper, a 9 year old from Washington, and “The Boy Who Couldn’t Stop Crying,” a story about a literal flood of emotion, written by a 6 year old from Rhode Island named Weylyn.
For more from the Story Pirates, visit storypirates.com/news
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
